definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉鹼是一種營養，幫助人體脂肪轉化爲能量。

sentences.english: Like the rain back in Canada that later turned to sleet.
sentences.chinese: 雨最終轉化爲雨夾雪，就像在加拿大那樣。

sentences.english: In joint offense has transitional form of crimes, also exists surplus behavior.
sentences.chinese: 共同犯罪中既存在轉化犯，也存在過限問題。

sentences.english: And, this conversion ratio, the Jacobian, works both ways.
sentences.chinese: 這個轉化率，也就是雅克比，兩種情況下都成立。

sentences.english: A part of polymeric deposit can be reconverted into methane and acetylene by hydrogen plasma.
sentences.chinese: 積炭能夠與氫氣等離子體反應轉化成甲烷和乙炔。

sentences.english: Loving support from a nineteen-year old bride helped bring about the transformation.
sentences.chinese: 愛從一個19歲的新娘支持促成轉化。

sentences.english: Such figures translate into major gains for the exporters of these and other commodities.
sentences.chinese: 這些數字轉化爲成爲相關商品出口商的巨大利益。

sentences.english: Inevitably, jealousy and desperation turn to enmity.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒和絕望不可避免的轉化爲敵意。

sentences.english: Unhealthful fats include saturated and trans fats.
sentences.chinese: 不利於健康的脂肪包括飽和脂肪及轉化脂肪。

sentences.english: It works by turning the sounds of the dental consulting room into a digital signal.
sentences.chinese: 它的工作原理是將口腔診室內的聲音轉化爲數字信號。

sentences.english: The basic function of management is to seek the way of knowledge-transfer.
sentences.chinese: 管理的最基本職能是尋求知識轉化的路徑與結點。

sentences.english: The second step is the conversion of decomposed matter to organic acids.
sentences.chinese: 第二個步驟是將已分解的物質轉化爲有機酸。

sentences.english: Sergio Aguero is the benchmark sofar for chance conversion.
sentences.chinese: KUN在機會轉化率方面是球員的標杆。

sentences.english: This translates into  potentially thousands of dollars that you saved the employer.
sentences.chinese: 這就會轉化爲你潛在的爲老闆節省了上千美元。

sentences.english: A application of bioconversion of cellulose in production of feed and fertilizer was reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了纖維素生物轉化在農業飼料和肥料中的應用。

sentences.english: So our challenge is always to translate them into practice.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們的挑戰一貫是，要把它們轉化爲實際行動。

definition: to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
